content:
Check:
  any:
    - name: --TESTCD
      operator: matches_regex
      value: ^[0-9]
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.18
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --TESTCD starts with a number
Outcome:
  Message: --TESTCD may not start with a number
  Output Variables:
    - --TESTCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '18'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Values of --TESTCD and QNAM values must be limited
                  to 8 characters, and cannot start with a number, nor can they contain
                  characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --TESTCD starts with a number

Outcome.Message: --TESTCD may not start with a number

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Values of --TESTCD and QNAM values must be limited to 8 characters, and cannot start with a number, nor can they contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
